title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 6.9 - Surroundings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 6.9 - Surroundings

State Regulations
A tester shall test only in an environment which is free
of undue dust, noise and vibrations, which has adequate lighting, ventilation
and work space, and which is otherwise in compliance with the applicable
provisions of Standard Methods. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
6.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
